com.snakybo.torch.component

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snakybo.torch.object.TorchObject
      • com.snakybo.torch.object.Component
        • com.snakybo.torch.component.Camera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Camera
extends Component

    Camera component, everything in the view of the camera is rendered every frame.

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setDepth

        public final void setDepth(int depth)

        Set the depth.
